column4: I'm installing gaim from cvs using checkinstall..what version # could I use that would not try to be overwritten when a dist-upgrade
there are repos for gaim beta 3 other than that you would have to pin it
I'd much rather build it myself
build it yourself than im just telling you grabbing the repo will stop 1.5 from conflickting or you can pin gaim2 so you dont get updates for it
